title: Version 2.2 Special Program｜Genshin Impact
author: Genshin Impact
description:
Dear Travelers,
This special program will feature juicy details about new game content and developments in Version 2.2. It will also "drop" some redemption codes and other goodies!
Special thanks to Travelers for your support and company. We will bring you more updates and information as they become available~
Travelers, we'll see you there!
(The redemption codes from this special program will expire on October 4, 00:00 (UTC-4), so be quick and redeem them~)

Download FREE: https://genshin.mihoyo.com/en

#GenshinImpact #miHoYo
